resources.string: Please hold the phone up and point the flash towards the middle of the gathering
Everyone loves a Mexican Wave. This app makes mexican waves out of the flashes on you and your friends\' phones.
Picture of a hand holding a phone in portrait orientation

All participants need to select the same wave size from the settings screen. Then hold the phones as shown above, and point all flashes towards the center of wherever you are having a Mexican Wave (or at the band if you\'re at a gig).
Go to the google play store to install the yell.com app

Thanks for trying our app. It was put together by the friendly guys at yell.com labs as a bit of fun. We hope you enjoy it. If you\'d like to try a somewhat more useful service, please try out the Yell app.
